text:
If liblua5.3 hasn't been compiled with the compatibility APIs enabled (this is true on Ubuntu 16.04 at least, and probably in Debian Jessie as well), mod_lua can't be compiled against it. For example, luaL_register() isn't a thing anymore.

The older deprecated APIs need to be replaced with their new versions, ideally wrapped in a LUA_HAS_XXX #define so we continue to support older Lua builds. See also bug 58188.
creator: jchampion@apache.org
